Certificate Requirements: Minimum 27 credits, excluding prerequisites to advanced courses
Minimum grade of 'C' in courses applied to the certificate

Complete the following:: IS 317 - Accounting Information Systems (3) (cross-listed as ECAC 317)
IS 417 - Information Systems for Auditors (3) (cross-listed as ECAC 420)
IS 304 - Ethical Issues in Information Systems (3)
IS 474 - Legal Aspects of Information Systems (3)
